cpl.readme: This plugin adds Syntax Highlighting for ~TiddlyWiki Classic tiddlers (text/x-tiddlywiki) to the [[CodeMirror|http://codemirror.net]] text editor. It needs the latest [[CodeMirror plugin|$:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror]] to be installed
cpl.title: $:/plugins/tiddlywiki/codemirror-mode-x-tiddlywiki
cpl.name: CodeMirror Mode TiddlyWiki Classic
cpl.description: Tiddlywiki Classic highlighting mode for CodeMirror
title: Plugin_202303171221161
